title: flight_plan
description: Flight plan including desired trajectory, preferences and contingency plans.

serial_number.description: Sistem ID of the drone or drones (when dealing with a swarm, otherwise the array should only contain a single S/N)

origin.description: Origin coords (WGS84 in Decimal Degrees format)

trajectory.description: The minimum WPs are origin an destination. This is optional.

altitude.description: Preferred altitude above sea level during all the flight.

geofences.description: Operators can define areas to avoid during the flight

max_speed_pref.description: Maximum speed desired by the operator (UC3M planner allowed preference). It applies to all the flight. The planner will try to fly at that speed where possible.
